description:
Out for revenge, Shark looks to sink his teeth into a duel with Quattro, but he instead gets hooked into an underwater battle with Quattro’s sinister sibling!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ketsui no Fukushuu: Kanashiki Duelist Shark
The Detemined Revenge, Tragic Duelist, Shark
決意の復讐 哀しき決闘者(デュエリスト)シャーク
